summary: When it appears as though the end is in sight, the pilots, flight crew, and passengers of a plane heading to Mexico City look to forget the anguish of the moment and face the greatest danger, which we carry within ourselves.
cast: Antonio Banderas|Penélope Cruz|Coté Soler|Antonio de la Torre|Hugo Silva|Miguel Ángel Silvestre|Laya Martí|Javier Cámara|Carlos Areces|Raúl Arévalo|Pepa Charro|Nasser Saleh|Concha Galán|José María Yazpik|Guillermo Toledo|José Luis Torrijo|Lola Dueñas|Cecilia Roth|Paz Vega|Blanca Suárez|Susi Sánchez|Carmen Machi|Violeta Pérez|Bárbara Santa-Cruz|María Morales|Marta Aledo|Ana Wagener|Carlos Sampedro|Javier Cidoncha|Agustín Almodóvar|Esther García|Tomás Virseda|Patricia Arévalo|Fernando Lueches|Lola García|Paulina Restrepo|Lola Lueches
title: Los amantes pasajeros
